title: Thunderbird latest release does not work when typing a message
content: Support needs to take their head out of the sand! With the latest release of Thunderbird for iOS it does not work when trying to type a message. The default is "preformat" and trying to change it to paragraph or other does not work. Older version works on my MacBook Pro (2011). My MacBook Air, Thunderbird writing message does not work. Glad I did not contribute money! Oh well must be a way to get folks to purchase Office 365, Outlook?
creator: dave.mcinnes

title: Having trouble sending and receiving email
creator: lamppostbk
